content: I think I'll go ahead and start looking for some fabric swatches with botanical prints. I'll make sure to consider the scale, color palette, and style of the print to ensure it complements my rug. Thanks for the tips on ordering swatches and creating a mood board - I'll definitely try that out. Oh, and one more thing - do you think it's a good idea to add some greenery to my living room, like a small potted plant or a vase with fresh flowers?
